name: Base Dash
description:
Base Dash is a little game about running endlessly in an alternate baseball dimension. Jump, dash and hit some balls until your eventual demise!

Controls
  • [Arrow keys] to move around and jump.
  • [Z] to swing your bat.
  • [X] to dash.
  • [ESC] to pause.

Check the How To Play screen in-game for more!

You can play in your browser or download the game. Mac OS X and Linux versions weren't tested, so be prepared for the worst!

Special thanks to Cape Coral for letting me use the amazing Malibu Club track.
